channel.title: Need some help
channel.description:
Hi, I wanna change something on my server, when i log-out you see [Evilscape logout] or somthing. Butt how do i change that, iam using the EvilScape sourch
Already thanks! for any help :)
Glenn,

item.title: Need some help
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

It should… You need to search exactly what it says though…

This is the logout button for Phonescape V1

[code] public void update()
{
handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
handler.updateNPC(this, outStream);

	sendFrame126("DONT LEAVE MEH!", 2458);

	flushOutStream();
}[/code]

It says on it “DONT LEAVE MEH!”. Just change it to whatever you wan’t it to say, for example : [code] public void update()
{
handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
handler.updateNPC(this, outStream);

	sendFrame126("Click here to logout", 2458);

	flushOutStream();
}[/code]  Yours will be different though, it will most likely say something like "Logout of Evilscape" or something, log on to you're server and see.

Read full topic
